stammer.translation[0].definitions[0].de: to speak with a lot of pauses and repeated sounds, either because you have a speech problem, or because you are nervous, excited etc
stammer.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: Whenever he was angry, he would begin to stammer slightly.
stammer.translation[1].definitions[0].de: a speech problem which makes someone speak with a lot of pauses and repeated sounds
stammer.translation[1].definitions[0].ex: Jeff spoke with a slight stammer.
